mapper.select:
SELECT notice_id AS noticeId, notice_title AS noticeTitle, update_time AS updateTime, notice_url as url FROM t_qyh_notice WHERE is_release = 1 AND notice_status = 0 AND FIND_IN_SET(notice_type,#{noticeTypeId})
AND INSTR(notice_title,#{noticeTitle})
ORDER BY update_time DESC

SELECT notice_id AS noticeId, notice_title AS noticeTitle, update_time AS updateTime,notice_url as url FROM `t_qyh_notice` WHERE is_release = 1 AND notice_status = 0
AND INSTR(notice_title,#{noticeTitle})
ORDER BY update_time DESC

SELECT qn.notice_id AS noticeId, qn.notice_title AS noticeTitle, qn.update_time AS updateTime, notice_url as url FROM t_qyh_notice_collection qnc LEFT JOIN t_qyh_notice qn ON qnc.notice_id = qn.notice_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND qnc.user_id = #{userId} AND qn.is_release = 1 AND qn.notice_status = 0
AND INSTR(qn.notice_title,#{noticeTitle})
ORDER BY qn.update_time DESC
